attributes.action: Give pregnant women a temporary permit to allow them to use disabled parking spaces
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Last summer my wife had to struggle carrying our baby when we visited places. Pregnant women can find it equally as difficult to walk distances as those entitled to a disable parking permit. Therefore I propose that a temporary permit be issued to mums-to-be for at least the latter 3 months of their preganancy and, perhaps a month after the birth.
